name: Legacy Quest
description:
LEGACY QUEST - AN EPIC HACK & SLASH ACTION RPG, CUBED
Train a bloodline of dungeon-crawling heroes, upgrade your skills, craft powerful weapons and armor, and hack your way through fierce monsters in this epic action RPG that has been featured as EDITOR'S CHOICE and in over 55 countries!

= NOTICE =
Compatible with iPhone 5s, iPad 3, iPad Air, iPad Mini 3, and iPod Touch 5th Generation OR NEWER. Legacy Quest WILL NOT work on iPhone 4 / 4S / 5 / 5c, iPad Mini 1 / Mini 2, or iPad 1 / iPad 2. Wifi or Cellular data connection is required.

Guide your hero through hundreds of dark and spooky dungeons full of speedy goblins, brain-eating zombies, chilling wraiths, ghostly skeletons, and epic giants who are out to destroy your heroic family legacy. Collecting all the best loot as you slay every monster in your path and build a family tree of powerful swords, axes, maces, bows and more as you gear up your family of heroic fighters.

= FEATURES =
* COLLECT AND TRAIN A BLOODLINE OF HEROES!
Guide the descendants of your family bloodline and reclaim your family legacy! Collect the souls of monsters and bosses by slaying your way through epic dungeons. Your fallen warriors will forever be remembered in your family tree!

* CRUSH HORDES OF EPIC MONSTERS AND BOSSES!
Don't fear the Reaper! Hack and slash your way through hordes of epic bosses, minions, and monsters.

* BEAUTIFUL 3D HACK AND SLASH ACTION RPG WITH CONSOLE-QUALITY GRAPHICS!
Gorgeous graphics and character-design, with console-style gameplay all in the palms of your hands.

* COLLECT TONS OF LOOT!
Collect tons of loot and crafting items and build epic, monster-slaying weapons and gear! Upgrade and customize your heroes before sending them into battle!

= SUPPORT =
Are you having trouble? Visit http://legacyquest.socialspiel.com/support
